statements: SELECT user_id, theme_color, temperature_units, notification_settings FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT theme_color, user_id, temperature_units, notification_settings FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT notification_settings, temperature_units, user_id, theme_color FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT theme_color FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE notification_settings = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, theme_color FROM UserPreferences WHERE theme_color = 'blue';
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE temperature_units = 'Celsius' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, notification_settings FROM UserPreferences WHERE notification_settings = true AND theme_color = 'green';
SELECT user_id, theme_color, temperature_units FROM UserPreferences WHERE temperature_units = 'Fahrenheit' LIMIT 3 OFFSET 2;
SELECT user_id, theme_color, notification_settings FROM UserPreferences WHERE notification_settings = false ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, theme_color FROM user_preferences WHERE theme_color = 'dark';
SELECT location, temperature_unit FROM home_settings WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM home_settings WHERE humidity_threshold > 50;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE first_name = 'John' AND timezone = 'EST';
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM user_preferences WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT email, theme_color FROM user_preferences WHERE theme_color = 'Dark';
SELECT * FROM home_settings WHERE temperature_unit = 'Fahrenheit' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT user_id, location, light_brightness FROM home_settings WHERE light_brightness > 50 ORDER BY light_brightness DESC, location ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences LIMIT 10;
SELECT theme, language FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 'b98dbe5c-9440-4c16-ae7b-3b6da93041f6';
SELECT * FROM home_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM device_settings WHERE device_id = 'bf805dd2-16cb-4b27-bca8-9db7da33e7f5';
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM user_preferences JOIN home_devices ON user_preferences.user_id = home_devices.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, theme FROM user_preferences WHERE theme = 'dark' ORDER BY theme DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM home_devices WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND device_type IN ('light', 'smart') ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM device_settings WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND setting_name LIKE '%brightness%';
SELECT user_id, language, timezone FROM user_preferences WHERE timezone = 'UTC' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, language, theme FROM user_preferences;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM device_preferences ORDER BY device_type DESC;
SELECT control_id, control_type, control_value FROM control_preferences WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT schedule_id, schedule_time, repeat_days FROM schedule_preferences WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY schedule_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT theme, language FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT control_type, control_value FROM control_preferences WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY control_type DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM device_preferences WHERE is_connected = TRUE AND device_type LIKE '%light%' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, device_id, schedule_time FROM schedule_preferences WHERE user_id = 2 AND repeat_days LIKE '%Mon%' ORDER BY schedule_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM UserProfiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT device_name FROM DevicePreferences WHERE user_id = 2 AND status = TRUE;
SELECT location, temperature FROM HouseSettings WHERE house_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY last_name, first_name DESC
SELECT user_id, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail%' OR email LIKE '%yahoo%'
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT house_id, location, temperature FROM HouseSettings WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT schedule_id, user_id, device_id, start_time, end_time FROM ScheduleSettings WHERE end_time < now()
